Posts.Content: Hi Loui,so sorry to hear of your diagnosis,it's a very difficult time for you especially if you don't have plan as to what is going to happen,I its hard for husbands but ths really is about you at the moment and it is hard to keep reassuring him,my husband was very saddened by my diagnosis but going through chemo and radiation was so hard fr me I could not worry how he was feeling. Wishing you ll the best.x
Posts.Title: Husbands
